title: Please support latest SQLAlchemy or pin it
raw_output:
{'files_to_modify': ['pyproject.toml', 'fastapi/encoders.py', 'docs_src/sql_databases/sql_app/main.py', 'docs_src/sql_databases/sql_app/database.py', 'docs_src/sql_databases/sql_app/crud.py'], 'reasoning': "1. pyproject.toml - The primary location for dependency pinning; modifying this file will resolve immediate test failures by restricting SQLAlchemy to a compatible version.
2. fastapi/encoders.py - Contains logic that may break on SQLAlchemy API changes (the 'sqlalchemy_safe' flag); update here may be required for compatibility with SQLAlchemy v1.4+.
3. docs_src/sql_databases/sql_app/main.py - The main async SQLAlchemy example; may require changes if SQLAlchemy DB/session usage needs API updates for compatibility.
4. docs_src/sql_databases/sql_app/database.py - Central DB config and engine/session setup; high likelihood of API breakage from updates, so needs to be checked and possibly modified.
5. docs_src/sql_databases/sql_app/crud.py - CRUD operations using SQLAlchemy ORM; update may be needed if model/query APIs have changed."}
